experience.title: Product
experience.description: > Reduced 20% in average resolution time by formulating process flows and managing stakeholders in shift of support desk> Improved CSAT scores by 25% MoM by revamping the customer support ticketing workflows and preparing SoPs> Increased adoption rate of In-app customer help center from 7% to 75% by conceptualizing and framing new UI and UX> Tracked KPIs by setting up the Analytics Dashboards, alerts and performance reports for operations & leadership teams
experience.description_html: > Reduced 20% in average resolution time by formulating process flows and managing stakeholders in shift of support desk> Improved CSAT scores by 25% MoM by revamping the customer support ticketing workflows and preparing SoPs> Increased adoption rate of In-app customer help center from 7% to 75% by conceptualizing and framing new UI and UX> Tracked KPIs by setting up the Analytics Dashboards, alerts and performance reports for operations & leadership teams <!---->

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Objective: Analyze and Ideate process and ways to reduce credit risk during online loan disbursal to a new credit borrower● Launched a new loan scheme 'Avatar' for shopkeepers and MSMEs to help revive their businesses during the COVID-19● Analyzed past years' data to predict Identity and Location as keys factors in the prevention of online financial fraud● Coordinated the Loan pre-processing cycle in online mode, including nomination, application, and verification processes
experience.description_html: Objective: Analyze and Ideate process and ways to reduce credit risk during online loan disbursal to a new credit borrower● Launched a new loan scheme 'Avatar' for shopkeepers and MSMEs to help revive their businesses during the COVID-19● Analyzed past years' data to predict Identity and Location as keys factors in the prevention of online financial fraud● Coordinated the Loan pre-processing cycle in online mode, including nomination, application, and verification processes <!---->

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Deep Learning Intern• Objective: to learn useful representations from a set of material microstructure images, that can lead to the efficient characterization of	microstructure  for use in establishing structure-property linkages in different material systems,	•A method to learn similarity metric based on Siamese neural network architecture and implemented by achieving the goal which then can be used to classify and cluster microstructures based on similarity into 7 classes.•Initialized the weights with the pre-trained VGG16 model and contrastive loss function in the Siamese network over CNN architecture to increase the accuracy from 95% to 97.6% for image dataset consisting of 2400 micrograph images• Improved the accuracy by using the triplet network and triplet loss which resulted in increased accuracy by 0.8%
experience.description_html: Deep Learning Intern• Objective: to learn useful representations from a set of material microstructure images, that can lead to the efficient characterization of microstructure for use in establishing structure-property linkages in different material systems, •A method to learn similarity metric based on Siamese neural network architecture and implemented by achieving the goal which then can be used to classify and cluster microstructures based on similarity into 7 classes.•Initialized the weights with the pre-trained VGG16 model and contrastive loss function in the Siamese network over CNN architecture to increase the accuracy from 95% to 97.6% for image dataset consisting of 2400 micrograph images• Improved the accuracy by using the triplet network and triplet loss which resulted in increased accuracy by 0.8%
experience.company: Tata Research Development and Design Centre (TRDDC)

experience.title: Virtual Research Consultant
experience.description: Quantitative trading: Research Consultant • Achieved Gold level in WorldQuant Challenge which witnessed over 10000+ participants and was awarded a position of Research Consultant• Creating fully automated high sharpe & diverse long-short Algorithmic Trading Strategies and backtesting them on WebSim Platform• Finding statistical arbitrage opportunities in the markets and utilizing statistical modelling to generate higher and less correlated returns
experience.description_html: Quantitative trading: Research Consultant • Achieved Gold level in WorldQuant Challenge which witnessed over 10000+ participants and was awarded a position of Research Consultant• Creating fully automated high sharpe & diverse long-short Algorithmic Trading Strategies and backtesting them on WebSim Platform• Finding statistical arbitrage opportunities in the markets and utilizing statistical modelling to generate higher and less correlated returns <!---->

positions.subtitle: International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: International Relations Cell is formed under Dean Of International Relations, with the aim of assisting the Office of Alumni Affairs and International Relations in facilitating the development and management of a variety of partnerships, linkages, and networks with institutions of academic excellence and repute all over the world.We are trying to put our best efforts to make IIT Kharagpur an elite global institution.
positions.title: Coordinator
positions.description_html:
International Relations Cell is formed under Dean Of International Relations, with the aim of assisting the Office of Alumni Affairs and International Relations in facilitating the development and management of a variety of partnerships, linkages, and networks with institutions of academic excellence and repute all over the world.

We are trying to put our best efforts to make IIT Kharagpur an elite global institution.

positions.subtitle: International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: We have taken several initiatives to boost IIT Kharagpur's International Ranking and to make its presence strong on the Global Platform. Improving and reviving many MOUs that IIT Kharagpur has with reputed universities dotted all over the globe. We are progressively working towards implementation of many initiatives like Foreign Training Program(FTP), Semester Exchange Programme, Faculty Newsletters and several others being in the developmental stage.
positions.title: Student Member
positions.description_html:
We have taken several initiatives to boost IIT Kharagpur's International Ranking and to make its presence strong on the Global Platform. Improving and reviving many MOUs that IIT Kharagpur has with reputed universities dotted all over the globe.

We are progressively working towards implementation of many initiatives like Foreign Training Program(FTP), Semester Exchange Programme, Faculty Newsletters and several others being in the developmental stage.

positions.subtitle: International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: 1)Lead a team to form INSAP (Incoming Students Assistance Package) to help the international students coming to IIT Kharagpur through Semester Exchange Program.2)Core Member of a project titled ' Vision 2020 IIT Kharagpur', which is an initiative to bring IIT Kharagpur among top 20 Technical Universities in the world
positions.title: Associate Member
positions.description_html:
1)Lead a team to form INSAP (Incoming Students Assistance Package) to help the international students coming to IIT Kharagpur through Semester Exchange Program.
2)Core Member of a project titled ' Vision 2020 IIT Kharagpur', which is an initiative to bring IIT Kharagpur among top 20 Technical Universities in the world

experience.title: Department Representative
experience.description: The organization strives to facilitate and guide students in career-related aspects with the aim to develop them into future industry leaders. Primarily, it provides facilities related to career growth including placements, internships, soft skill training, industry-related workshops, leadership discussions, management development programs, professional career counselling and many others.One of 30 students selected by a panel of Placement Co-ordinators to facilitatePlacements and Internships of 3000+ students (highest across all IITs).

experience.title: Secretary Basketball,Technology Students' Gymkhana
experience.description: Contested in college-wide elections and won this post with unanimous support. Now the duty was to organize any event related to basketball including NSO trials, fresher's tournament and inter-hall tournaments with a participation of more than 200 students. I managed a budget of Rs. 3.15 lakh for the enhancement of basketball facilities in the campus. Catered to the needs of the Inter IIT Basketball Contingent in the 51st Inter IIT Sports Meet. I am an office bearer of Technology Students' Gymkhana.

honors_and_awards.title: INSPIRE Fellowship Holder
honors_and_awards.description: Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE) is being implemented by the Department of Science & Technology (DST), Government Of India to strengthen the National Science and Technology base. It is given to the students who have cleared JEE(Advance) Examination and have a rank under AIR 10000.
